thread.title: Crystal Palace goalkeeper Steve Mandanda goes boxing | Daily Mail Online

author: Jack Bezants For Mailonline
title: Crystal Palace goalkeeper Steve Mandanda goes boxing | Daily Mail Online
text: comments Crystal Palace goalkeeper Steve Mandanda has been toughening up for the fight to avoid relegation from the Premier League by getting in the boxing ring. Palace are 19th in the Premier League table, two points from safety and have only won once in their last 11 league matches. Mandanda has been out since November with a knee injury but his Instagram video of him in the ring will provide Palace fans with hope that he is due to return soon. Crystal Palace goalkeeper Steve Mandanda (left) has been in the boxing ring Mandanda has been out with injury since November but is on the comeback trail 'When life gets tough put on your boxing gloves,' Mandanda wrote alongside the footage. Mandanda was signed by former Palace boss Alan Pardew last summer from Marseille. RELATED ARTICLES
